title: Character Inking Problems
body: I've noticed this small visual bug on a number of champions for a long time, but had never figured out what was causing it until recently. Basically the character inking effect only applies to a limited frame on the character models, and many of the models have parts that extend beyond this frame and will not receive the inking effect. I attached a number of screenshots to better illustrate this

replies.body:
Hey 0ny,

Thanks for the report. :]  This a global issue that impacts a good portion of models, both base and skins. We're aware of the issue and have been working on a resolution.

sorry to necro this post but, its been a year and no changes have you guys (riot) given up on fixing it? i still see it all the time and it bothers me a tiny bit. tons of patches, new champs but no visual bug fixes
We haven't given up, but unfortunately, it's not the highest priority at the moment. It's a large systems change that isn't a quick fix.
